title: CAN EKKO GET A FUCKING NERF
body:
DUDE THIS CHAMPION DOESN'T TAKE ANY SKILL. JUST WALK UP AND E SOMEONE WITH LICH BANE AND THEY'RE EITHER DEAD OR CHUNKED TO HELL.
THE STUN? HEY, LOWER IT TO 1.75s OR LESS. ITS LITERALLY SO AIDS PLAYING AGAINST THIS CHAMPION WHO CAN STUN YOU FOR LITERALLY THE SAME DURATION AS GAREN'S SILENCE.

please for the love of god. GUT THIS FREELO CANCER
